title: After Winning Oscar, Director Asghar Farhadi Has a Special Guest Read Anti-Trump Statement | The Daily Dot
text:
Screengrab via Cosmopolitan/Twitter BTW 
After winning his second best foreign language film award for The Salesman , Asghar Farhadi’s statue was accepted in absentia—due to his publicized boycott of the Oscars in the name of President Trump ’s travel ban. 
But not before a politically charged statement from the lauded Iranian director was read by Anousheh Ansari, the first Iranian in space and first self-funded woman to fly to the International Space Station. Firouz Naderi, a former NASA director, also represented Farhadi onstage. Perhaps the biggest round of applause yet #oscars pic.twitter.com/LXRJ2hBewj
